message:
18-party calls 48-hr rail, road, waterways blockade from today

Rejecting the election schedule announced by the Election Commission,           
                       .......................ALJAZEERA NEWS
 
18-party alliance on Monday called a 48-hour rail-road-waterway blockade programme from 6 am Tuesday.
BNP acting secretary general Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir announced the protest programme at the chairperson's Gulshan office immediately after the announcement of the polls schedule.
"The 48-hour blockade programme will begin at 6am Tuesday and end at 6 am Thursday," Fakhrul said.
The BNP leader urged the government to suspend the polls schedule until there is a consensus between the opposition and the ruling alliance over holding the polls under a non-party government.
name: opposition calls 48-hr rail, road, waterways blockade @ aljazeera
